doc.field: Typescripts: "Spain," Emmet J. Hughes (1955); copy of "The United States of America and the Cause of the Spanish Republic – 1936-1939," Arthur Landis Announcement of course: "The Spanish Civil War and its International Impact," New School for Social Research, Fall 1981 Pamphlet: "These Americans Say, 'Lift the Embargo Against Republican Spain'" (1939) Periodicals: World News and ViewsVol. 19, no. 27 (May 1939) re: Czechoslovakia; International Press CorrespondenceVol. 16 No. 20 (Apr 1936) re: Spain Poster: "The Good Fight"
